name: Art of Descend
description:
A bunch of thugs came to rob an ancient place and got into trouble. For Max, however, it was an opportunity to prove himself and master a new art.

Controls:
Left Mouse Button to walk around
Right Mouse Button to move red objects
Escape for pause
Skip levels in the menu, if you want

Created in 5 days for the 2019 Epic MegaJam.
